shortdesc.ph: Sets the audio session’s operational restriction.

section.p: This method can be called multiple times.

ul.li: This method is for iOS only.

This method restricts the SDK’s manipulation of the audio session. By default, both the SDK and the App have control over the Audio Session, but in some scenarios, the app may wish to restrict the Agora SDK's control over the Audio Session, and use other applications or third-party components to control the Audio Session. This function can be realized by calling this method.
The SDK does not configure the audio session anymore.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: Sets the audio session’s operational restriction. This parameter is Bit Mask, and each Bit corresponds to a permission.
